biotools.summary: The PlantTFDB 2.0 plant transcription factor (TF) database contains detailed annotation including general information, domain feature, gene ontology, expression pattern and ortholog groups, as well as cross references to various databases and literature citations for these TFs. Multiple sequence alignments and phylogenetic trees for each family can be shown as Weblogo pictures or downloaded as text files.
